enchantment.l2enchantments.anti_magic.de: Have a chance to bypass protection and resistance. Conflicts with Soul Slash.
enchantment.l2enchantments.digest.desc: When saturation is low, cost 2 food level to restore 1 saturation level.
enchantment.l2enchantments.fast_leg.desc: Give speed effect at high food level.
enchantment.l2enchantments.fragile.desc: Lower durability, more damage. Conflicts with Unbreaking and Robust.
enchantment.l2enchantments.heavy_swing.d: Increase damage and durability at the cost of attack speed. Conflicts with Light Swing.
enchantment.l2enchantments.invisible_arm: Armor invisible to mobs and players.
enchantment.l2enchantments.life_sync.des: When health is sufficient, cost health to repair item. Level up to lower the health threshold.
enchantment.l2enchantments.light_swing.d: Increase attack speed at the cost of damage and durability. Conflicts with Heavy Swing.
enchantment.l2enchantments.reach.desc: Increase reach distance, effective on main hand tools and armors.
enchantment.l2enchantments.remnant.desc: Preserve item at 0 durability, but item lost attributes until fixed.
enchantment.l2enchantments.robust.desc: Reduce durability cost for high durability cost action.
enchantment.l2enchantments.soul_slash.de: Has a chance to bypass armor. Conflicts with Anti Magic.
enchantment.l2enchantments.stable_body.d: Increase knockback resistance, cancel screen shaking when health is high.
enchantment.l2enchantments.stacking_dama: When damage is reduced, next attack increase a portion of reduced damage. Conflicts with Tracing Damage.
enchantment.l2enchantments.tracing_damag: when attacking the same target, increase damage exponentially. Conflicts with Stacking Damage.
